channel.title: I can login, but others can't
channel.description: So I can get on my server all I want, but nobody else can...what do I do to fix this? Yes, I click runserver. Still doesn't work. Anything will help! Thanks!

item.title: I can login, but others can't
item.dc:creator: @soeib soeib
item.description:
@soeib wrote:

you have to portforward so that other can log in to your server… 1st go to start then click run…and in the box type cmd no spaces, nothing…then in the black screen that comes up…type ipconfig, when you do that look at where it says default gateway…type what it says in the address bar…like for example if it says 0.0.0.0 then type that in. After that you will get a box that says username and password…if your cpu is ¨¨default¨¨then type admin in both boxes and it should work also try administrator in both boxes…if this didnt help then visit portforward.com

Read full topic
item.source: I can login, but others can't

item.title: I can login, but others can't
item.dc:creator: @Massownage Massownage
item.description:
@Massownage wrote:

No, I don’t know how to Port forward with my router, but I did no-ip…I downloaded the program from no-ip.com, but I cant find it now, and I can’t go back and download again =[

EDIT: Gh0stb4rr4g3, I think the word you were looking for was ‘Look’, not ‘Lock’. Just trying to help with your learning of English! =] It’s hard, but you’ll get it after awhile!
